revised_title: Magnetic Observations at Falmouth Observatory in 1897
tldr: This article reports the magnetical observations conducted at Falmouth Observatory for the year 1897. The observations were used to determine the Declination, Horizontal and Vertical Forces, and Inclination. The data was collected using various instruments and methods, and the results are presented in tables. The study aimed to understand the magnetic variations and their impact on the Earth's magnetic field.
